Add tag to user ID in mega top right ; 20-May-2013 shobby CORE-81.3.3: Enhances User Menu padding ; 04-Jul-2012 shobby SR17998: Back button functionality. ; 07-May-2012 shobby SR17998: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new HTML,YKEY,YYBACK new idForm,objWWW013,lstForms,intLoop,objWWW120,startForm,EnsembleTag ;CORE-110.2 new objVARParametroCliente,acessoChamado,countdown,extract,delim,extract ;LEAN-2 set YYBACK=YBACK new YBACK set YBACK=YYBACK_YFORM_"," new YFORM set YFORM="WWW013" set YKEY=YBED Set webportstatus = ##class(%RoutineMgr).GetWebServerPort(.WebPort,.ServerName,.UrlPrefix,.Url) Set strNamespace = $znspace set middlware = "" if ($find($zcvt($get(%request.CgiEnvs("HTTP_URL")),"U"),"HEALTHSHARE") > 0) { set middlware = "healthshare/" } set urlResource = Url _"csp/"_middlware_ strNamespace_"/" set objWWW013=$get(^WWW013(YM,YBED,1)) set objVARParametroCliente=$get(^VARParametroCliente(YM,YM,1)) set computerName = $zconvert($zutil(110),"U") ;CORE-385.11 set nameSpace = $zconvert($znspace,"U") ;CORE-385.11 if ( ((computerName = "SRV-WBL03CHD") || (computerName = "SRV-WBL04CHD") || (computerName = "SRV-WBL11CHC") || (computerName = "SRV-WBL10CHD") ) && ((nameSpace = "SESDF") || (nameSpace = "SESDF-NEW") || (nameSpace = "SESDF-TESTE")) ){ set EnsembleTag = "" } else{ set EnsembleTag = "/"_$zconvert($piece($zutil(131,1),":",2),"L") //Instance name lowercase } set HTML="" &html<
